name: Night Spirits
description:
This is a recreation/adaptation of a piece by Tracey Moffatt, see here:http://blog.qagoma.qld.gov.au/tracey-moffatt-spirited/

If you want to know more about what Night Spirits is, check this out.

There is a build for the HTC Vive that is a seperate download. If you are looking for this one be sure you download the right build.
